questions_answers.How many different agents appear and wha: There are 4 agents: hera.ugr.es, clavo.ugr.es, hera2.
questions_answers.Which type of event is the most critical: The most critical event is "Wazuh agent disconnected." with level 3.
questions_answers.Which event is repeated the most times?: The most repeated event is "PAM: Login session opened." occurring 2689 times.
